title: "A Glitch in the Matrix" - Jordan Peterson, the Intellectual Dark Web & the Mainstream Media
description:
Journalist David Fuller made the first full documentary about Jordan Peterson, and also used to work at Channel 4 News as producer and reporter for over a decade. He takes a close look at the recent viral interview with Cathy Newman and uses this cultural watershed to unpack the deeper political, psychological and archetypal levels of the clash.

Background to the 'making of' - in this Medium article: https://medium.com/rebel-wisdom/a-glitch-in-the-matrix-jordan-peterson-the-intellectual-dark-web-the-mainstream-media-f9a82dd096f2

Rebel Wisdom is a new platform making films about the biggest ideas - if you found our work valuable, please consider sponsoring us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom

http://davidfuller.tv/

For more great films check the Rebel Wisdom website: http://rebelwisdom.co.uk/

Links:

Rebel Wisdom: Jordan Peterson, Truth in the Time of Chaos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjqXXengN1s&t=900s

Deep Code: Situational Assessment 2017, Trump Edition
https://medium.com/deep-code/situational-assessment-2017-trump-edition-d189d24fc046

Rebel Wisdom: A Glitch in the Matrix, The Deep Code Assessment
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4NEvuQWR3oo&t=1086s

The Rubin Report: Jordan Peterson and Ben Shapiro: Frontline of Free Speech
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRPDGEgaATU&t=1800s

Jordan B Peterson, Critical Theory, and the New Bourgeoisie
http://quillette.com/2018/01/17/jordan-b-peterson-critical-theory-new-bourgeoisie/

Geenstijl Interview with Jordan Peterson
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E6qBxn_hFDQ

The Rubin Report: What is The Intellectual Dark Web?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n5HN-KT9rj0

Joe Rogan Experience #958 - Jordan Peterson
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=USg3NR76XpQ&t=1s

Joe Rogan Experience #1070 - Jordan Peterson
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6T7pUEZfgdI

Modern Times: Camille Paglia & Jordan B Peterson
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-hIVnmUdXM&t=696s
